comprehensive_overview: F-seq is a Python package that provides tools for peak calling and peak detection in functional genomics datasets, specifically ChIP-seq and DNase-seq data. It is designed to identify enriched regions in the genome that represent potential binding sites of proteins or other functional elements.
core_features: Peak calling in ChIP-seq and DNase-seq data
Identification of enriched regions in the genome
Analysis of potential binding sites of proteins or functional elements
